title: LOL ping increased and game becomes laggy(macbook player)
body:
Im playing NA server on Malaysia,i played for a year,its is usually 250ping since the server was relocated to Chicago.
But a week ago,the ping will sometimes increased to 300++ping and the game becomes laggy.
I checked connection and it was fine.
SAVE ME I WANNA GET GUD IN THIS GAME.
I NEED SMOOTH GAMEPLAY TO GET GUD AND START TO PLAY RANK.
SAVE ME PLS!!!!!!
QAQ

replies.body: It sounds like your network could be having some packet loss while routing to the game server.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your case, which will also provide troubleshooting steps to help improve your connection.  Keep in mind that you're physically pretty far from the server, so your connection's strength can't exceed that distance.  Hope that helps!
